dimension: 48 x 1 3/16 in. (121.92 x 3.02 cm) (without tassels and fringe)
title: Headband (Cinta)
description: tapestry woven with wrapped ends; geometric designs in grey, black, white, salmon, pale pink, yellow, orange; thick purples, green, pink pompons at ends with long wrapped, looped and loose fringe
